summary: This bill amends Title 38 of the United States Code to authorize individuals awarded the Purple Heart for service in the Armed Forces to transfer their unused Post-9/11 Educational Assistance to eligible family members. It outlines eligibility criteria, the process for transfer, limits on the amount and use of transferred benefits, and provisions for revocation, modification, and administrative matters. It also addresses the handling of benefits in the event of the transferor's death and mandates coordination between the Secretaries of Veterans Affairs and Defense.
